Name: Broadcast
Description: A broadcast distribution of Broadcast Content. This can be an radio station, podcast, satellite station, etc. To be co-typed with a more specific type that provides details on the method of broadcasting.

Properties.Name: Area Served
Properties.Description: Areas in which this Broadcast is available.

Properties.Name: Distributor
Properties.Description: The distributor of the Broadcast (could be the Internet provider, the antenna, or the satellite).
